step_data.thought: Looking at the current page, I can see that I'm already on the Themes page. The URL in the RootWebArea confirms this: 'http://127.0.0.1:7780/admin/admin/system_design_theme/'. The page shows a table with two themes: 'Magento Blank' and 'Magento Luma'. The heading [678] also confirms we're on the 'Themes' page. Since the goal was to access the Themes page to manage store design themes, and we're already there, I should inform the user that we've successfully completed the task.
step_data.action: stop('You are now on the Themes page where you can manage store design themes. The page displays two available themes: Magento Blank and Magento Luma. You can view or edit theme details by clicking the "View" link next to each theme.')
